channel.title: Port of Entry on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Port of Entry on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South - Port of Entry
item.description: I-15 south at Port of Entry. This Port of Entry is for Arizona, although it is located across the line in Utah.

item.title: I-15 South - Exit 1
item.description: I-15 South approaching Exit 1 - Port of Entry (Arizona).

item.title: WA-25 South - Welcome To The United States
item.description: Welcome To The United States on WA-25 South. Port of Entry at Frontier Washington. Open 24 hours a day. The border facility is in the background.

item.title: ID-1 North - Proceed To Canada Customs
item.description: ID-1 North - Northbound traffic proceed to Canada Customs.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill Idaho Port of Entry
item.description: ID-1 North at Porthill Idaho Port of Entry. Merge right to continue into Canada.

item.title: ID-1 North - Porthill Port of Entry Hours
item.description: Porthill Port of Entry Hours on ID-1 North. Porthill is not a 24 hour port of entry.

item.title: US-95 North - Idaho Ports Of Entry Hours
item.description: Customs hours approaching on US-95 north approaching ID-1 junction. Porthill Port of Entry (via ID-1) open from 7 AM - 11 PM. Eastport Port of Entry (via US-95) open 24 hours.

item.title: US-2 West - Port of Entry Information For MT-16
item.description: US-2 West - Regina Canada 24 Hour Port of Entry, via MT-16 north. The next 24 hour port of entry westbound into Canada is on I-15 at Sweetgrass.

item.title: US-191 South at US-491
item.description: US-191 South at US-491. Use US-491 east for Cortez (Colorado); continue south on US-191 for Blanding. This is the northern end of US-491. Also US-491 east for the (Utah) Port of Entry.

item.title: I-8 East - Exit 1
item.description: I-8 east at Exit 1 - Redondo Center Drive/Giss Parkway. This is the first Arizona exit along I-8. Approaching the Arizona Port of Entry.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 166
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 166 - CA-186/Algodones Road/Andrade. Use CA-186 south for access to the Algodones Port of Entry with Mexico. The Port of Entry is closed from 10 PM to 6 AM.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching CA-7 - Port of Entry Hours
item.description: I-8 east approaching CA-7 - Border Crossing Hours. Port of Entry Closed from 12AM to 6AM.

item.title: I-15 North at Port of Entry
item.description: I-15 North at (Willard) Port of Entry.

item.title: US-160 East - Arizona Port of Entry
item.description: East US-160 approaching the Arizona Port of Entry.

item.title: US-95 - U.S. Border Station, Eastport, Idaho
item.description: US-95 north at the US Border Station - Eastport, Idaho.
